entry.title: T8 LED Sign Tubes with R17 Base, Ballast-Bypass & Rotatable, Advertisement Lighting
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Sign Tubes
Price: 249.56 - 2889.90 (12 variants)

360 Degree - T8 R17 Base LED Sign Tubes, led Outdoor Tubes for Double-Sided Signs 6500K Cool White Clear Cover 

Available in different sizes and wattages these LED Sign Tubes are a perfect fit for replacing Non-LED retrofit fixtures like the conventional T12HO or T8HO fluorescent lamps used for sign applications. You can choose your best pick from a variety of sizes viz. 2ft, 4ft, 5ft, 6ft, 8ft, and, 10ft, all of which use R17D base style. These lights come in a lumen output range of 2340-7280 lumens providing cool white light having a CCT of 6500K.

These LED SIgn tubes work without Ballast Ballast Bypass. fixtures, these LED lighting fixtures are a versatile replacement for your old fixtures. The light fixture comes with an ultra-wide-beam angle of 360 degrees and operates on an input voltage of AC100-277V. These double-ended LED tubes are rotatable and come in a clear transparent finish bringing about 75% of energy-savings.

The lights pass through heavy testing to obtain IP68, and ETL listings making these lights both waterproof and hazard-free. On each purchase, you get a 5-year manufacturer's warranty and 50,000 hours of tested lifetime.

entry.title: Ballast Compatible T8 4ft 20W LED Tube 2800 Lumens 6500K Clear
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Tubes
Price: 17.53 - 1558.05 (4 variants)

In LEDMyplace our Ballast Compatible T8 4ft 20W LED Tube with 6500K color temperature and a CRI of >80 can deliver lumens up to 2800. It is an excellent substitute for T8, T10 & T12 fluorescent tubes. This 20W can safely and easily replace a fluorescent tube of 70W and bring energy-savings of 50W. Thus, a lower utility bill for you every month. This 20W can work with ballast and hence the existing fluorescent tube should be taken out and the LED tube must be put in its place. However, you must ask us for a ballast compatibility list. These 20W LED tubes are housed in rugged die-cast aluminum for efficient heat dissipation. For the standard ceiling height, these LED tubes having a beam angle of 180 degrees, emit enough bright light, have a long lifespan, and have a shatterproof coating unlike the fluorescent tubes that were of inferior light quality, typically low lifespan, and usually with no shatterproof. One of the best things about LED tubes from LEDMyplace is they are ETL listed.

entry.title: T8 4ft LED Tube Light Glass, 18W, 4000K, 1800 Lumens, Clear, Plug N Play (Check Compatibility List; Not Compatible with all ballasts)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Tubes
Price: 113.78 - 227.57 (2 variants)

The internal driver in plug-and-play LED tubes, also known as ballast compatible ( check with our ballast compatibility list) or "Type A" tubes, allows them to operate with a linear fluorescent ballast. These 18 Watts T8 LED Plug and play Tube fixtures come with a clear glass finish. These plug-and-play tubes deliver an output of 1800 Lumens with a CCT of 4000 K. These light fixtures are designed to withstand and function in a voltage range of 120-277V. These tubes come with a lifespan of 50,000 hours and a manufacturer warranty of 5-years. Plug and play eliminate the need for expensive electrical jobs, providing customers with greater versatility and convenience.

entry.title: T8 4ft LED Glass Tubes, 18W, 4000K, Single-Ended Power, Frosted, Single-Ended Power
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Tubes
Price: 113.85 - 227.70 (2 variants)

S.E.P. (Single Ended Power) tubes take power from just one end of the tube. A non-shunted tombstone powers it. There are two pins on the power end. One pin is used for line power, while the other is used for neutral. These 18 W T8 4ft LED Tube light fixtures to come with a clear glass finish. With a CCT of 4000k. These light fixtures are designed to withstand and function in a voltage range of 120-277V. These single-ended tubes deliver an output of 1800 Lumens. These tubes come with a lifespan of 50,000 hours and a manufacturer warranty of 5-years. A complete lighting fixture in itself, these single-ended LED Tube Lights are practical, durable, and eco-friendly.
